message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to consider it, but I need to make a bit more profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still a bit far from my minimum price, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $108.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $102 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not comfortable with the price, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me and the negotiations we've had, I would like to propose a final price of $105 for the product.
I'm sorry, Bob, but I've already gone as low as I can. I'm not willing to sell the product for less than $110. If you're willing to meet me at that price, I'm willing to accept.
